text: but I can confirm tonight that there has
been a significant development and that
the counterterrorism policing network is
now leading the investigation into this
incident this evening I've received test
results from Portland down that showed
that the two people have been exposed to
the nerve agent nava truck at
approximately 10:15 a.m. on Saturday the
30th of June the Southwest ambulance
service was called to a residential
address in Ames burg a 44 year-old woman
had collapsed and she was subsequently
taken to hospital at around 3:30 p.m.
that day the ambulance service was
called back to that same address where a
45 year old man had also fallen ill the
man was taken to hospital and Wiltjer
police were then informed from initial
assessment it was thought that the two
patients had fallen ill after using
drugs from the potentially contaminated
batch however on Monday the 2nd of July
due to concerns over the symptoms both
the man and the woman were displaying
samples from both patients were sent to
Portland down laboratory for analysis
following the detailed analysis of those
samples we can confirm that the man and
woman had been exposed to the nerve
agent Navarro which has been identified
as the same nerve agent who contaminated
both auu and Sergei Schwimmer
the latest update we have from the
hospital is that both patients remain in
a critical condition
